doc:
Robert Emhardt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Emhardt 0 Robert Emhardt (July 24, 1914 – December 26, 1994) was an American character actor who worked on stage, in film and on television. The portly Emhardt was frequently cast as a villain, often a crooked businessman or corrupt politician. Robert_Emhardt ( July_24_,_1914 – December_26_,_1994 ) was an_American_character_actor who worked on stage , in film and on television . The_portly_Emhardt was_frequently_cast as a_villain , often a_crooked_businessman or corrupt_politician .
